data.text:
Get incredible pleasure from the picturesque landscapes and romantic walks while sailing past the beautiful islands. You can get spectacular photos and capture pleasant moments for a lifetime.

This tour is perfect for those who want to spend a relaxing day with the kids at the Lady Hotel or enjoy a scenic walk along the Wannsee and Lake Oberhavel. Feel the idyll of the old place while walking along the mesmerizing lakes and marveling at the outstanding natural landscapes.

The nature of northern Berlin is diverse and mysterious, so everyone should definitely see the traditional chain of Berlin lakes. Have an absolutely magical experience that you will remember for a long time.

Boat trips can be designed so that the traveler has the opportunity to look at and appreciate the old and new Berlin and do so with maximum comfort and convenience.

Important to know
